propSpec.name: hidden
propSpec.desc: When true, the hidden class will be applied to hide the modal

propSpec.name: display
propSpec.desc: When true, the modal will be hidden

propSpec.name: inputMda
propSpec.desc: Contains the metadata that should be rendered in the viewport. Should not be used in conjunction with value.

propSpec.name: lookup
propSpec.desc: Data that should be entered into the modal if open has a value

propSpec.name: lookupDtaObj
propSpec.desc: The path pointing to the lookup data

propSpec.name: lookupFilters
propSpec.desc: A list filters that should be applied to the lookup

propSpec.name: lookupPrps
propSpec.desc: A object of extra lookup prps

propSpec.name: fromId
propSpec.desc: The ID of the component that caused the modal to load

propSpec.name: complex
propSpec.desc: When true, the modal will automatically render a toolbar with a close button and an inner container to house the lookup grid
